name: Don't Wake Me Up!
description:
Developed fot LUDUM DARE 50, theme: Delay the inevitable

-----

You have your wake up alarm configured, but people want to wake you up earlier. Don’t allow it! Delay your wake up hour!

Avoid incoming hands to touch your LIMBS.

CONTROLS: use your mouse left button to move hands and feet.

IMPORTANT: you can only move HANDS and FEET, no other parts of arms or legs are selectinable!
